resources.string: Set your monthly spending budget for cool stuff on the net and IRL:

Collect bitcoin addresses of people and projects you want to support on the regular .. Bloggers, Podcasters, DJs, Bands ... at the end of the month your budget will get automatically split between all of them. Just keep on collection.
1 to 5 mBTC would be enough for the beginning
Its not a valid Bitcoin Address.
You support nobody yet .. use options on the start tab to scan or enter bitcoin addresses.
Do you really want to cancel support for:
On this date the app will request you to authorize the payment from your local bitcoin wallet.
Ready to do your monthly supporttr donations:
Forward Donations to your local Wallet

NOTICE: This is a proof-of-concent integration with your local bitcoin wallet. At the moment every single support transaction is needing your patient interaction and separate bitcoin transaction fee. In future version there will be just one transaction with multiple outputs. Also not tested with all wallets out there yet - tested with Schildbach Wallet. :)
Its time for your monthly Bitcoin Supporttr donations :)
Supporttr 0.1 Proof-Of-Concept\nBerlin Texas Hackathon 2014 Demo\nby Christian@Rotzoll.de
